field.name: fInacurracyDistanceMult
field.desc: multiplier for distance at which aiming helper is least accurate.

field.name: fFadeOutStartDistanceMult
field.desc: multiplier for start distance for fade out of snap aim.

field.name: fFadeOutStopDistanceMult
field.desc: Multiplier for stop distance for fade out of snap aim where it is off.
